form.valid: Please, enter your phone or email

contact.pre1: We work around the world find us here
contact.smallText: Send a request or contact with us

team.previewSlogan: We are a  team of specialists around the world
team.previewText: Our employees are best of the best because they can create wherever they feel most comfortable

about.previewSlogan: We help your business achieve new goals
about.previewText: Clients come to us when they have a great idea, but need a team of experts to help them bring it to life
about.leftText: The best talent, no matter where you are
about.rightText: MoraMora is a quite young but very ambitious full cycle software development company. We have already created several unique digital solutions for B2B and B2C enterprises. Our company are professionals with a deep background and great experience in custom software. We have a team of developers, project managers, business analysts, UX/UI designers who have been gathered together in order to provide the best services and innovative technologies to our customers all over the world! Each of our projects is a unique mix of individual approach, broad outlook, talent and deep professionalism. We seek not trivial solutions for every client based on his vision of the task, his wishes and needs. Our motto: never give up, be a head...!

whatwedo.previewSlogan: We create custom digital product for each company
whatwedo.previewText: Using contemporary development technologies we transform your ideas into real business value
whatwedo.commonText: “Each new day is a new opportunity to create digital products. And that's exactly what we like”

firstProcessBlock.title: Briefing
firstProcessBlock.description: Send us a detailed briefing including the following information: who you are / core values / business goals / target group / what you are selling / required features / scope of the project or sitemap / timeframe and deadlines / examples of other sites you like.

secondProcessBlock.title: Concept
secondProcessBlock.description: We will have an in-depth look at your briefing and evaluate whether the project fits both parties' conditions and requirements. If it’s a match, we will have a meeting to discuss how to proceed.

thirdProcessBlock.title: Design
thirdProcessBlock.description: We will create an initial design of the project and build a foundational architecture to solve your business challenges and to be compatible to your existing ecosystem

fourthProcessBlock.title: Development
fourthProcessBlock.description: We will develop a unique digital solution for your business taking into account all your current needs and requirements. We will test the created system for fault tolerance. And will make sure you are completely satisfied with a final version of custom software for your business.

home.descriptionWhiteBlock: Our goal is to assist businesses in achieving a leading position in their respective industries. We strive to make our clients stand out from their top competitors and ensure their satisfaction by leaving no stone unturned in the process. Our mission is fueled by a perfect combination of passion, dedication, and a generous amount of caffeine, which is crucial in aiding our efforts. Ultimately, we aim to bring a smile to our clients' faces as they see the positive results of our work.

whatBox1.title: Software & App Development
whatBox1.description: Our software developers will take your ideas to the next innovation level. We offer a comprehensive set of IT services to help you grow your business. With our experienced teams we create the most challenging and effective solutions.

whatBox2.title: Website Design & Development
whatBox2.description: Our UX/UI designers will bring fresh trends to your web infrastructure, from automation to artificial intelligence we are here to help. Through our complete website solutions we provide web translation services, so you can reach your audience.

whatBox3.title: Branding
whatBox3.description: Our branding specialists will bring your business to an unreachable level. With a strategic approach, we help companies operate better in the digital age. We use our knowledge of the impact of technology on business processes.
